# Syncify - Chrome Extension

> Seamless Chrome Extension for Modern Browsing

## Overview

Syncify is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience with seamless synchronization, productivity tools, and intelligent features.

## Key Features

- **Seamless Synchronization**: Keep your browsing data synchronized across all devices
- **Smart Bookmarks**: Organize and access your bookmarks intelligently
- **Tab Management**: Efficiently manage and organize your browser tabs
- **Privacy Focused**: Your data stays secure and private
- **Lightweight**: Minimal resource usage for optimal performance
- **Modern UI**: Clean and intuitive interface

## Pricing

- **Free**: Basic features for individual users
- **Pro ($9/month)**: Advanced features with unlimited sync
- **Enterprise ($29/month)**: Full feature set with team management

## Technical Details

- Platform: Chrome Extension (Manifest V3)
- Technology: Modern web technologies
- Performance: Optimized for speed and efficiency
- Privacy: No tracking, your data stays yours

## Installation

Available on Chrome Web Store. Install with one click and start enhancing your browsing experience immediately.

## Support

For support, feature requests, or feedback, visit our website or contact us through the extension.
